step_feedback.feedback: Your shoulder movements are generally good, but try to bring your shoulder blades back and down more smoothly. Focus on the circular motion.
You're doing a great job squeezing your shoulder blades back. Remember to also focus on the downward motion to complete the circle. Keep up the effort!
Excellent! You've completed the repetitions. Remember to breathe deeply as you pull your shoulders back to maximize the benefits.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the shoulder rolls! Focus on making the circular motion smoother, especially bringing your shoulder blades down. Remember to breathe deeply as you pull them back.
